prompts: Create a playful puppy-like Pokemon that loves to explore the outdoors.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves into a fierce wolf at night with unique fur patterns.
Design a cute Rock-type Pokemon that has a rocky texture and blue eyes.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a small canine, with a fluffy tail and brown fur.
Generate a Pokemon that combines elements of a dog and a rock, perfect for rugged terrains.
Make a Pokemon with a loyal personality and a unique ability to sense emotions.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats and has a strong bond with trainers.
